mapper.insert: insert into diary ( contactNo, conDt, title, contents, regDate ) values ( #{contactNo}, #{conDt}, #{title}, #{content}, now() )
insert into images ( type, contactNo, readNo, realNm, virtualNm, regDate ) values ( #{type}, #{contactNo}, (SELECT no FROM diary order by no desc limit 1), #{realNm}, #{virtualNm}, now() )
mapper.select: select d.no, d.conDt, d.contactNo, d.title, d.contents, d.regDate, c.name from diary d,contacts c where d.delyn='n' and d.contactNo = c.no and d.no = #{no}
select no, virtualNm from images where type = #{type} and readNo = #{no}
